name: Collaterals Design Lead
description:
We are seeking an intelligent and talented Collaterals Design Lead to join our CTO office. While the role is remote, we require a deep involvement in the operation of our CTO office in the US and support of all activities related to pre-sales for our customers in the US and Europe. This is an exciting opportunity for an experienced Collaterals Design professional to join a dynamic team at a thriving period of significant growth and expansion.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop and update collateral materials to promote our new and current solutions in pre-sales stage

  • Create, format, and beautify blogs, white papers, and workshop related presentations

  • Estimate timelines well and deliver as estimated

  • Ensure materials are accurate and available for the team

Requirements:

  • Proven experience in a similar role in the engineering company

  • A strong team player and proactive attitude

  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills, as well as a keen eye for detail

  • Ability to drive projects through to completion, delivering clear defined results and impact

  • Advanced English level

We offer:

  • Participation in challenging projects, an opportunity for professional development and growth
  • Flexible work hours and a dynamic environment
  • Friendly cooperative team and atmosphere
  • Medical insurance, benefits package

About us:

Grid Dynamics is an engineering services company known for transformative, mission-critical cloud solutions for the retail, finance, and technology sectors. We have architected some of the busiest e-commerce services on the Internet and have never had an outage during the peak season. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in San Ramon, California with offices throughout the US and Eastern Europe, we focus on big data analytics, scalable omnichannel services, DevOps, and cloud enablement.
